name: Chasing Sheep VR
description:
Experience authentic Icelandic hobbies: chasing sheep and eating mushrooms! In VR!

You have 3 minutes to get as many sheep as you can back into the barn. Eat mushrooms to gain super speed and make the sheep follow you for a short amount of time.

Instructions:

1. Run in place to run

2. Run faster to run faster

3. Turn body to turn

3. Chase the sheep into the barn area

Game works with GearVR and soon there will be a Cardboard version. This game was created in Iceland at Isolation Game Jam 2016.
